## BuildLocalModulesHooks."build-local-module"() method

A `parallel` type hook. It will be invoked once a `local module` need be built.

Note: This hook will be triggered by the change of each `module`<!-- -->'s own file and its `source` file. So this hook may be invoked multiple times with the same `lmn`<!-- -->. However, because we have a caching mechanism, this `module` will only be built once.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
'build-local-module'(lmn: string, context: Context): Promisable<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  lmn | string | <code>local module</code> name |
|  context | Context |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promisable&lt;void&gt;
